meanings.definition: A person who goes or attends a particular event or place.
meanings.sent1: The movie theater was full of excited goers waiting to see the latest film.
meanings.sent2: The concert was a huge success with thousands of goers enjoying the music.
meanings.sent3: The goers at the zoo were so fascinated by the playful monkeys.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the goers moved like colorful ants in a busy colony.
meanings.sent5: The goers at the amusement park screamed with joy on the roller coaster.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns indicating a person who goes or participates in a specific activity.
meanings.sent1: The marathon had many eager goers ready to run the race.
meanings.sent2: The book club welcomed new goers interested in discussing literature.
meanings.sent3: The cooking class had enthusiastic goers eager to learn new recipes.
meanings.sent4: The dance competition attracted talented goers showcasing their skills.
meanings.sent5: The art workshop was filled with creative goers expressing themselves through painting.
